thread.title: Awards season wouldn’t be complete without the Razzie nominations (9 Photos)
thread.title_full: Awards season wouldn’t be complete without the Razzie nominations (9 Photos)

author: Shelbie
title: Awards season wouldn’t be complete without the Razzie nominations (9 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
As we all anticipate the early hours of tomorrow morning to learn which films the Academy deemed the best of the best this year, the Golden Raspberry Awards were announced today to tide us over. They’re the polar opposite of the Oscars, highlighting the worst of the worst that Hollywood had to offer in 2016. Hopefully the actors nominated realize that sometimes you just have to laugh at your missteps and take the ‘honor’ in stride. 
Without further ado, the nominations for the 2017 Golden Raspberry Awards are…. 
Worst Picture 
Batman V Superman: Dawn of Justice Dirty Grandpa Hilary’s America: The Secret History of the Democratic Party Independence Day: Resurgence
